Last night @HouseDemocrats passed bipartisan legislation to stand up for our troops—ensuring that Gold Star spouses and spouses of injured servicemembers never face this burden again.
When our troops are severely injured or killed during service penalties for breaking a home or auto lease are the last thing their families should have to deal with.

What you might not know:   ➡️Military families are more likely to rent homes because of how often they move.   ➡️If a servicemember is killed or badly injured their family often faces a steep penalty for breaking their lease.
